20110125010006.000|20110125010007.000|CC1|CAREENED INTO SOME CHILDREN WHO 
20110125010007.000|20110125010008.000|CC1|WERE STANDING ON A NORTHEAST    
20110125010008.000|20110125010008.000|CC1|CORNER THERE.                   
20110125010008.000|20110125010010.000|CC1|ONE OF THOSE CHILDREN, A        
20110125010010.000|20110125010012.000|CC1|12-YEAR-OLD BOY, WAS PINNED     
20110125010012.000|20110125010013.000|CC1|UNDER THE CAR, AND ACCORDING TO 
20110125010013.000|20110125010015.000|CC1|THE FIRE DEPARTMENT, WAS DRAGGED
20110125010015.000|20110125010016.000|CC1|ABOUT 20 OR 30 FEET.            
20110125010016.000|20110125010018.000|CC1|HE WAS THE ONE WHO HAD TO BE    
20110125010018.000|20110125010021.000|CC1|PULLED OUT FROM UNDERNEATH THAT 
20110125010021.000|20110125010022.000|CC1|CAR.                            
20110125010022.000|20110125010022.000|CC1|THAT'S YOUNG BOY WHO IS STILL   
20110125010022.000|20110125010025.000|CC1|HERE AT UCI MEDICAL CENTER.     
20110125010025.000|20110125010027.000|CC1|THE SECOND CHILD WHO WAS MOST   
20110125010027.000|20110125010028.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY HURT WAS APPARENTLY   
20110125010028.000|20110125010031.000|CC1|HIT BY CONCRETE FROM A PLANTER  
20110125010031.000|20110125010032.000|CC1|NEARBY.                         
20110125010032.000|20110125010033.000|CC1|HE HAS BEEN TAKEN TO WESTERN    
20110125010033.000|20110125010034.000|CC1|MEDICAL CENTER IN SANTA ANA.    
20110125010034.000|20110125010036.000|CC1|ALONG WITH THE 19-YEAR-OLD      
20110125010036.000|20110125010039.000|CC1|DRIVER OF THE SECOND CAR.       
20110125010039.000|20110125010040.000|CC1|THERE WERE TWO MORE CHILDREN    
20110125010040.000|20110125010041.000|CC1|INJURED.                        
20110125010041.000|20110125010043.000|CC1|THEY WERE TAKEN TO PLACENTIA    
20110125010043.000|20110125010044.000|CC1|COMMUNITY HOSPITAL.             
20110125010044.000|20110125010045.000|CC1|TREATED AND RELEASED.           
20110125010045.000|20110125010046.000|CC1|WE'RE TOLD THEIR INJURIES ARE   
20110125010046.000|20110125010047.000|CC1|MINOR.                          
20110125010047.000|20110125010048.000|CC1|BUT ACCORDING TO DISTRICT       
20110125010048.000|20110125010050.000|CC1|OFFICIALS, THIS IS VERY NEAR    
20110125010050.000|20110125010051.000|CC1|GEORGE KEY ELEMENTARY SCHOOL.   
20110125010051.000|20110125010053.000|CC1|AND THAT CHILDREN HAD CROSSED   
20110125010053.000|20110125010054.000|CC1|FROM SIDEWALK TO SIDEWALK,      
20110125010054.000|20110125010056.000|CC1|ACTUALLY USING A CROSSING GUARD 
20110125010056.000|20110125010057.000|CC1|AT THE TIME.

20110125010059.000|20110125010101.000|CC1|BELIEVE THE INITIAL DRIVER, THE 
20110125010101.000|20110125010103.000|CC1|NORTHBOUND DRIVER, WAS WATCHING 
20110125010103.000|20110125010104.000|CC1|THOSE CHILDREN CROSS AS OPPOSED 
20110125010104.000|20110125010106.000|CC1|TO WATCHING THE ONCOMING        
20110125010106.000|20110125010106.000|CC1|TRAFFIC.                        
20110125010106.000|20110125010107.000|CC1|BUT HE DID NOT YIELD.           
20110125010107.000|20110125010111.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHEN THE ACCIDENT
